Translations.Text: Tazmamt ters ed $uôek, ur teppili segs lhejna deg idmaren ik, iwakken a pnabiv yis; u d asmekti i lmumnin
Ddut d wayen id irsen $uôwen, s$uô Mass nnwen. Ur teddut d imawlan, war Neppa. Drus id tesmektayem
Acêal n temdinin ay Nessenger. Tusa ten id tiyta nne£, deg ives nnsen, ne$ deg uqeggel nnsen
Ti$ôi nnsen, mi ten id tusa tiyta nne£, siwa mi d nnan: "ih, nella d imednas
War ccekk, a Nesteqsi wid u$uô id Nuzen, a Nesteqsi imazanen
War ccekk, ad asen Neêku, s tmusni, ur Nelli N$ab
Awzan, assen, d tidep. Wid iwumi ééayet lweznat nnsen, widak d wid irebêen
Wid iwumi fessuset lweznat nnsen, widak d wid ixesôen iman nnsen, seg akken sednasen issekniyen nne£
Ni$, s tidep, Nesrekd ikwen di tmurt, Nerra yawen, degs, tamâict nnwen. Drus ay tesnemmirem
Ni$, s tidep, Nxelq ikwen, sinna, Nmesl ikwen, sinna, Nenna i lmalayek: "knumt i Adem"! Knant, siwa Iblis. Ur illi seg wid iknan
